sqlMap.insert: insert into t_feed ( feed_id, activation_date, termination_date, allow_concurrent_runs, allow_failed_state_runs, collect_phase_stats, restart_at_checkpoint, last_sequence_number, max_concurrent_runs, feed_directory, feed_document, from_data_source_id, to_data_source_id, feed_type_id, feed_protocol_id, feed_direction_id, feed_group_id, feed_queue_type_id ) values ( #feedId#, #activationDate#, #terminationDate#, #allowConcurrentRuns#, #allowFailedStateRuns#, #collectPhaseStats#, #restartAtCheckpoint#, #lastSequenceNumber#, #maxConcurrentRuns#, #feedDirectory#, #feedDocument#, #fromDataSource.feedDataSourceId#, #toDataSource.feedDataSourceId#, #feedType.feedTypeId#, #feedProtocol.feedProtocolId#, #feedDirection.feedDirectionId#, #feedGroup.feedGroupId#, #feedQueueType.feedQueueTypeId# )
sqlMap.update: update t_feed set feed_id = #feedId#, activation_date = #activationDate#, termination_date = #terminationDate#, allow_concurrent_runs = #allowConcurrentRuns#, allow_failed_state_runs = #allowFailedStateRuns#, collect_phase_stats = #collectPhaseStats#, restart_at_checkpoint = #restartAtCheckpoint#, last_sequence_number = #lastSequenceNumber#, max_concurrent_runs = #maxConcurrentRuns#, feed_directory = #feedDirectory#, feed_document = #feedDocument#, from_data_source_id = #fromDataSource.feedDataSourceId#, to_data_source_id = #toDataSource.feedDataSourceId#, feed_type_id = #feedType.feedTypeId#, feed_protocol_id = #feedProtocol.feedProtocolId#, feed_direction_id = #feedDirection.feedDirectionId#, feed_group_id = #feedGroup.feedGroupId#, feed_queue_type_id = #feedQueueType.feedQueueTypeId# where feed_id = #feedId#
